publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6451 David Stewart: Congratulations to Brora Rangers Under-19 Squad—That the Parliament congratulates Brora Rangers under-19s, the management, players and all those involved with the club on being crowned Highland Youth Champions 2009-10 for the first time; notes the hard work and determination of the players and coaching staff on what was a fitting end to an incredible season, which also included playing the eventual winners, Celtic FC in the fourth round of the Scottish Youth Cup, and wishes Brora Rangers under-19 squad every success in 2010-11.
S3M-6451 Congratulations to Brora Rangers Under-19 Squad (lodged on 1 June 2010) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-6451 David Stewart: Congratulations to Brora Rangers Under-19 Squad—That the Parliament congratulates Brora Rangers under-19s, the management, players and all those involved with the club on being crowned Highland Youth Champions 2009-10 for the first time; notes the hard work and determination of the players and coaching staff on what was a fitting end to an incredible season, which also included playing the eventual winners, Celtic FC in the fourth round of the Scottish Youth Cup, and wishes Brora Rangers under-19 squad every success in 2010-11. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Mary Scanlon*
S3M-6451 Congratulations to Brora Rangers Under-19 Squad (lodged on 1 June 2010) Rhoda Grant*, Peter Peacock*
